subject: Re: [sugar] eBook software
body:
if OLPC will use an existent web server, it doesn't matter. Wheter
not, I can help to develop one, I have experience developing one in C,
maybe a new one written in Python can solve the needs.

Eduardo.

Or I can help you

On 4/16/07, Stephen Thorne  wrote:
> On 4/16/07, Eduardo Silva  wrote:
> > Which Web Server is being used?? or gonna be used???
>
> Doesn't matter. That's just a minor, interchangable, implementation detail.
>
> Stephen.
>
